title: Introduction To Python Programming For Beginners

lectures_videos_topics.topic_name: List, Tuple, Sets and Dictionary in Python

overview.description: Python is an open-source language. It's very easy to learn programming language when compared to other languages like Java, C, etc.  It's a cross-platform language, which means that code written for one operating system, such as Windows, will work well on other operating systems as well like macOS or Linux without making any changes in the code. When you are programming in python it takes lesser lines of code to achieve a particular task.
overview.motto: Get start your programming career with python language in an easy and simple way | Learn Python in 2 Hours
topic_covered: Collection of List Tuple Sets & Dictionaries
course_for: Beginners who have never programmed before
People curious about programming
People who want to learn how to program in python
Programmers switching languages to Python
Students who want to pursue a career in AI, data science, or web development
This course is NOT for those who are experienced python language
benefits: Learn how to code in Python
Understand the basics concepts of Python
Write your own programs in Python
requirements: Interest in learning a new programming language
Everything is included in this course. No prior knowledge needed
Access to a computer or laptop that contains Windows, Mac, or Linux operating system

It's very easy to learn programming language when compared to other languages like Java, C, etc.  It's a cross-platform language, which means that code written for one operating system, such as Windows, will work well on other operating systems as well like macOS or Linux without making any changes in the code. When you are programming in python it takes lesser lines of code to achieve a particular task.
overview.motto: Get start your programming career with python language in an easy and simple way | Learn Python in 2 Hours
topic_covered: Collection of List Tuple Sets & Dictionaries
course_for: Beginners who have never programmed before
People curious about programming
People who want to learn how to program in python
Programmers switching languages to Python
Students who want to pursue a career in AI, data science, or web development
This course is NOT for those who are experienced python language
benefits: Learn how to code in Python
Understand the basics concepts of Python
Write your own programs in Python
requirements: Interest in learning a new programming language
Everything is included in this course. No prior knowledge needed
Access to a computer or laptop that contains Windows, Mac, or Linux operating system
